reason: Root claim states MAIN with a SINGLE integral using kernel [gamma(1+d_A*gamma)]^{-1}. The correct formula (MAIN') has TWO integrals: a forward term integral_{1/d_A}^{M_fwd(t)} Tr[P_beta delta_AB^{(beta)}]/beta dbeta plus a reverse term integral_{d_A}^{M_rev(t)} Tr[Q_beta (1_A x delta_B - beta delta_AB)]/beta^2 dbeta, where Q_beta(t) = 1{tau(t)-beta*rho(t)>0} is the reverse spectral projector. Caused by incorrect single-term Frenkel formula in node 1.6.1.
